name: food-order-backend
description: Food Order Lifecycle System Backend Services

scripts.install:all: pnpm run install:gateway && pnpm run install:order && pnpm run install:restaurant && pnpm run install:delivery
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm run start:gateway" "pnpm run start:order" "pnpm run start:restaurant" "pnpm run start:delivery"
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:gateway" "pnpm run dev:order" "pnpm run dev:restaurant" "pnpm run dev:delivery"
